use.flag: Build the pam_userdb module, that allows to authenticate users against a Berkeley DB file. Please note that enabling this USE flag will create a PAM module that links to the Berkeley DB (as provided by sys-libs/db) installed in /usr/lib and will thus not work for boot-critical services authentication.

Build the pam_cracklib module, that allows to verify the chosen passwords' strength through the use of sys-libs/cracklib. Please note that simply enabling the USE flag on this package will not make use of pam_cracklib by default, you should also enable it in sys-auth/pambase as well as update your configuration files.
